doc.description:
DB Interface
 *
 *
These methods have to be implemented on both database and query.
Most methods usable on query should be also usable directly through database, which will create the query apply its method.

name: bbn\db\actions

get_row.name: get_row
get_row.summary: Fetches the database and returns an array of a single row text-indexed

get_rows.name: get_rows
get_rows.summary: Fetches the database and returns an array of several arrays of rows text-indexed

get_irow.name: get_irow
get_irow.summary: Fetches the database and returns an array of a single row num-indexed

get_irows.name: get_irows
get_irows.summary: Fetches the database and returns an array of several arrays of rows num-indexed

get_by_columns.name: get_by_columns
get_by_columns.summary: Fetches the database and returns an array of arrays, one per column, each having each column's values

get_obj.name: get_obj
get_obj.summary: Fetches the database and returns an object of a single row, alias of get_object

get_object.name: get_object
get_object.summary: Fetches the database and returns an object of a single row

get_objects.name: get_objects
get_objects.summary: Fetches the database and returns an array of objects

description:
*
 *
These methods have to be implemented on both database and query.
Most methods usable on query should be also usable directly through database, which will create the query apply its method.

description_parts.content: These methods have to be implemented on both database and query. Most methods usable on query should be also usable directly through database, which will create the query apply its method.
